prompt: c=$(ls -1 ~/panda/factory/output 2>/dev/null | wc -l); ts=$(date -Iseconds); if [ "$c" -ge 1 ]; then echo "COMPLETATO" > ~/panda/factory/report/final_report.txt; else echo "FALLITO" > ~/panda/factory/report/final_report.txt; fi; echo "TIMESTAMP=$ts" >> ~/panda/factory/report/final_report.txt; echo "FILES_PROCESSATI=$c" >> ~/panda/factory/report/final_report.txt
